commits.message: Enhance MainMenu component with new Chaos Mode features and recovery logs
Refactor MainMenu component by removing unused glitch transform helper
Implement Chaos Mode in MainMenu with dynamic click detection and visual effects
Enhance Chalkboard and MainMenu components to support dynamic chalk color selection
Remove content preview from NotesModal to streamline note display and improve layout consistency.
Enhance NotesModal to sync editor content based on view mode changes
Add view mode toggle to NotesModal for enhanced note management
Refactor note creation logic in NotesModal and useNotesStore for improved ID handling
Add paste handling functionality in NotesModal component
Refactor NotesModal and useNotesStore for improved note synchronization and optimistic updates
Enhance NotesModal and useNotesStore to improve error handling for note editing
Update version history and make minor adjustments across multiple files
Add confirmation modal for note deletion in NotesModal component

Implement local state for note title in NotesModal to prevent cursor jumps during editing. Sync local title with active note changes and adjust debounce timing for title updates, enhancing user experience and responsiveness.

Refactor NotesModal component to improve handling of empty states and loading indicators. Introduce conditional rendering for loading and empty note scenarios, enhancing user experience by providing clear feedback during data fetching and when no notes are available.

Update NotesModal and useNotesStore components to handle author email more robustly, providing a fallback to 'Unknown' or 'Anonymous' when email is not available. This enhances user experience by ensuring consistent display of author information.

Refactor NotesModal and useNotesStore components to remove unnecessary error handling in remote notes fetching and simplify subscription logic for note updates. This improves code clarity and maintains functionality.

Enhance NotesModal component to support user authentication, integrating remote note management with local storage fallback. Implement debounced updates for note content and title, ensuring smooth synchronization. Update UI to reflect loading states and author information, improving user experience for both local and cloud notes.

Refactor AuthModal and useAuthStore components to streamline authentication logic. Remove unnecessary data destructuring in signUp and signIn methods, and add placeholder for signInWithEmail implementation to suppress linter errors.

Update dependencies in package.json and package-lock.json, adding @supabase/supabase-js and zustand. Enhance MainMenu component with user authentication features, including login/logout functionality and user profile display. Update version history to reflect changes.
Update Chalkboard component import statement for cleaner code structure.

Refactor Chalkboard component to use global event listeners for pointer events, improving drawing responsiveness and simplifying event handling. Remove unnecessary local references and optimize stroke updates.
Update Chalkboard component to start fading strokes after 10 seconds instead of 5 seconds, enhancing visual effects.
Add Chalkboard component to MainMenu
Update VersionModal component and version history data for version 0.0.89, improving commit list rendering and adding new commit details.

Update package.json scripts to include version generation and enhance MainMenu with version history feature. Add version badge and modal for displaying version information, improving user experience and accessibility to version details.

Enhance NotesModal component by adding a new resize handle for the bottom side, allowing users to resize the modal vertically. Update interaction handling to support the new 'resize-s' type, improving overall user experience with modal resizing functionality.

Refactor NotesModal to consolidate window state management, enabling persistent resizing and repositioning. Introduce new resize handles for improved user interaction and update local storage handling for window dimensions.

Refactor NotesModal component to enhance interaction handling for resizing and moving. Introduce new state management for position and size, improving user experience with draggable and resizable modal functionality.
Add Notes feature to DeckbuilderScreen with modal integration
Add visual effects for Junk and Bones abilities in GameScreen

Enhance GameScreen and gameReducer to prevent selling 'skull' items from the backpack. Update visual feedback for 'skull' sales and adjust hand clearing logic to include 'skull' type, improving game state management and user experience.
Remove 'graveyard' ability and associated logic from monster abilities and game reducer. Update relevant types to reflect this change, streamlining the codebase and improving maintainability.
Remove 'Барьер' spell and related logic from GameScreen and gameReducer. Update spell types and adjust GameScreen's non-damage removal checks accordingly to reflect the changes in spell availability.

Enhance GameScreen logic to handle monster fleeing scenarios. Introduce specific checks for 'БЕГСТВО' log to accurately reflect damage taken during escape. Update monster ability description for clarity on fleeing conditions. Improve logging for monster attacks to include HP details upon fleeing.

Implement sequential HP visualization in GameScreen. Introduce HpUpdate interface and update gameReducer to manage HP changes with timestamps. Refactor HP display logic to use visualHp state for smoother animations during gameplay.
Update 'whisper' ability description and logic to reflect card peeking mechanics. Adjust logging messages for clarity when no cards are available in the deck.
Fix GameScreen backpack reference to correctly access card ID. Remove unused gamePlusReducer file to streamline codebase and improve maintainability.

Refactor GameScreen and gameReducer to improve reset logic. Introduce canReset condition based on player HP and cards on the table, enhancing game state management. Update reset button styling to reflect new reset conditions, ensuring better user experience during gameplay.

Enhance game state management by introducing a location prop for Card and Slot components, allowing for better tracking of card positions (hand, backpack, field). Update GameScreen and gameReducer to accommodate the new structure, ensuring proper handling of card interactions and state updates. Refactor related components to improve code clarity and maintainability.

Enhance CardComponent and Slot components with drag state management. Add onDragChange prop to CardComponent for notifying parent about drag status. Update Slot component to handle child dragging state and adjust visual feedback accordingly, improving user interaction during drag-and-drop operations.

Refactor GamePlusScreen component by removing unused imports and interface definitions, and re-enable saveRun functionality. Update index.css to remove duplicate font import. Clean up gameReducer by removing deadCoin case, streamlining the code for better maintainability.
Remove 'public' from .gitignore to streamline ignored files, ensuring only relevant directories are excluded from version control.

Fix image path in MainMenu component by correcting the filename format for the extra image. This update ensures proper loading of the image asset and maintains consistency in the image naming convention.

Add sticker functionality to MainMenu component. Implement random sticker images with dynamic positioning and interactive features, enhancing visual engagement and user experience. Include a fullscreen overlay for enlarged sticker viewing with captions.

Update quotes in MainMenu component to reflect new humorous messages about Serega and Kirill. This change enhances the thematic engagement of the interface by adding fresh, playful content that resonates with the game's spirit.

Add dynamic footer quotes to MainMenu component. Implement a rotating quote feature that updates every 5 seconds, enhancing user engagement with humorous and thematic messages related to the game. This update enriches the overall user experience and adds a playful element to the interface.

Refactor drag event handling in GameScreen components to improve code consistency. Update onDragEnd callbacks in CardsViewer, OverheadStatsWindow, and GameLogWindow to remove unused event parameter, enhancing readability and maintainability.
